## Cloud provider
AWS

## IP address and DNS name 
mn01
```
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# sudo cat /etc/hosts
127.0.0.1   localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4
::1         localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# sudo cat /etc/resolv.conf
; generated by /sbin/dhclient-script
search ec2.internal b2b.opentecnologia.com
nameserver 172.31.0.2
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# sudo ifconfig
eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 12:02:BF:5E:0F:1A
          inet addr:172.31.87.98  Bcast:172.31.95.255  Mask:255.255.240.0
          inet6 addr: fe80::1002:bfff:fe5e:f1a/64 Scope:Link
          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:9001  Metric:1
          RX packets:2902 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0
          TX packets:2660 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000
          RX bytes:177254 (173.0 KiB)  TX bytes:224313 (219.0 KiB)
          Interrupt:145

lo        Link encap:Local Loopback
          inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0
          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host
          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:65536  Metric:1
          RX packets:0 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0
          TX packets:0 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0
          RX bytes:0 (0.0 b)  TX bytes:0 (0.0 b)

[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# sudo cat /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
DEVICE="eth0"
BOOTPROTO="dhcp"
IPV6INIT="yes"
MTU="1500"
NM_CONTROLLED="yes"
ONBOOT="yes"
TYPE="Ethernet"
UUID="52658143-fe10-477a-861f-410a6e8f57e4"
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]#
```

```
          inet addr:172.31.92.45  Bcast:172.31.95.255  Mask:255.255.240.0
          inet6 addr: fe80::105c:a8ff:fe7c:2238/64 Scope:Link

          TX packets:3690 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000
          RX bytes:329965 (322.2 KiB)  TX bytes:384259 (375.2 KiB)
          Interrupt:145

          inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0
          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host
```

```
eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 12:1D:28:0E:BB:10
          inet addr:172.31.92.116  Bcast:172.31.95.255  Mask:255.255.240.0
          inet6 addr: fe80::101d:28ff:fe0e:bb10/64 Scope:Link
          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:9001  Metric:1
          RX packets:3686 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0
          TX packets:3311 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000
          RX bytes:261749 (255.6 KiB)  TX bytes:339580 (331.6 KiB)
          Interrupt:145

          inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0
          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host

          TX packets:0 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0

```

```
          inet addr:172.31.94.28  Bcast:172.31.95.255  Mask:255.255.240.0
          inet6 addr: fe80::1071:10ff:fee4:1bc4/64 Scope:Link

          TX packets:2720 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0

          inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0
          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host
```

```
[root@ip-172-31-81-26 ~]#
```

## File System
```
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# df -h
Filesystem      Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
/dev/xvda1      197G  927M  186G   1% /
tmpfs           7.8G     0  7.8G   0% /dev/shm
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]# fdisk -l

Disk /dev/xvda: 214.7 GB, 214748364800 bytes
255 heads, 63 sectors/track, 26108 cylinders
Units = cylinders of 16065 * 512 = 8225280 bytes
Sector size (logical/physical): 512 bytes / 512 bytes
I/O size (minimum/optimal): 512 bytes / 512 bytes
Disk identifier: 0x00057cbb

    Device Boot      Start         End      Blocks   Id  System
/dev/xvda1   *           1       26109   209714176   83  Linux
[root@ip-172-31-87-98 ~]#
```
